method.name: _addalpha
method.comment: Causes a fading in or fading out effect.This animation affects the view's transparency (fading effect). The alpha values are between 0 to 1 where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque. Target : View for animaitons FromAlpha : first Frame value ToAlpha : last Frame value Duration : animation cycle time, sets the animation duration. Value is measured in milliseconds. RepeatMode : Gets Or sets the repeat mode. Relevant when RepeatCount Is larger than 0 (Or -1). The default Is REPEAT_RESTART which means that the animation will restart each time. REPEAT_REVERSE causes the animation To repeat in reverse each time. RepeatMode : REPEAT_RESTART (1) and REPEAT_RESTART(2) like original Animation lib. RepeatMode : Default is REPEAT_NULL (0) RepeatCount:Gets or sets the number of times the animation will repeat. A value of 0 means that it will play once. Set to -1 for a non stopping animation. **** This same use " InitializeTranslate " Animation [lib] in B4A IDE

method.name: _addrotate
